data.meanings: to swing, halt in a place, move, toss. Mankind, people, others, men.
data.sentence: The word النَّاسُ comes from the root ن و س and is associated with the meanings: to swing, halt in a place, move, toss. Mankind, people, others, men.

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word يَكُونُ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to spread out, extend, stretch forth, furnish. furshan - to low (carry burden), be thrown down (for slaughter) of small animals of which flesh is used for food. farashun (gen. n.) moths. firashun (plu. furushun) - carpet, thing that is spread out to lie upon, bed. Wife/spouse (metaphorically).
data.sentence: The word كَالْفَرَاشِ comes from the root ف ر ش and is associated with the meanings: to spread out, extend, stretch forth, furnish. furshan - to low (carry burden), be thrown down (for slaughter) of small animals of which flesh is used for food. farashun (gen. n.) moths. firashun (plu. furushun) - carpet, thing that is spread out to lie upon, bed. Wife/spouse (metaphorically).
The word الْمَبْثُوثِ comes from the root ب ث ث and is associated with the meanings: spread/dispersed/scattered, published/revealed.
